response.explain: The previous action code successfully opened the top cabinet. The next step is to take out the jar from the cabinet.
response.subtask:
(1) Move to the top cabinet.
(2) Open the top cabinet.
(3) Take out the jar.
(4) Take out the lid.
(5) Put the lid on the jar.
response.code:
